title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10075.3 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10075.3 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Fees and
charges. All fees, charges and surcharges payable under the provisions of these
regulations shall be paid to the Buffalo Sewer Authority. These charges shall
be as specified in the latest edition of the Buffalo Sewer Authority Schedule
of Sewer Rents (see Appendix 52 of this Title). (b) Estimated quantities and values. Unless
otherwise provided herein, whenever the fees, charges and surcharges required
by these regulations are based on estimated quantities the general manager
shall make such determinations in accordance with estimating practices
heretofore used by the B.S.A. or as he deems appropriate in the best interest
of B.S.A. (c) Payment of charges and
delinquent charges. All fees, charges and surcharges imposed under the
provisions of these regulations as well as delinquent charges will be as
specified in the latest edition of the B.S.A. schedule of Sewer Rents (see

Appendix 52 of this Title). Copies of the schedule are available at the B.S.A. General Office, 1038 City Hall, Buffalo, NY 14202. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10075.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
